Myriadian Arc

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Namespaces

  • Page

Page actions

This page contains changes which are not marked for translation.

The capital of Wrentmark, acting as an oasis to those making treks through the deserts. The city bustles with activity as people rush by to get and deliver their wares amongst the shops and services. The busy workers always needing fresh materials to complete their advanced crafts.

Myriadian Arc is a location that can be found in the Wrentmark region.

Faction

Myriadian Arc is a member of the following factions:

Wrentmark

Activities

Emergency Activity

These Emergency Activities are only visible if you are missing key items for traveling, and are there to prevent softlocks.

Emergency desert escape

Buildings

The following buildings can be visited at this location.

Bank
Jeweled Oasis Bank
General store
Southern Gem

Services

The following services can be used at this location.

Heatstroke Metalworks (Advanced)
Granular Faceting Facility (Advanced)
Wardrobe
Mysterious Merchant

Routes

The following routes are available at this location.

  Crown of Cinders 
495 Base Steps1
 Myriadian Arc 
  Kildome Cross 
950 Base Steps1
  1. While having Navigate Desert ability available.

Trivia
